Name: Voice Onset Time in Cochlear Implant Patients (diachronic data)
Description: This corpus contains diachronic speech recordings from three cochlear implant (CI) users. For data used in the corresponding synchronic study, please refer to the CI_2 corpora.  CI_3_Sibilants contains recordings used for the analysis of /s/ and /Êƒ/ in the following words: 'Tasse', 'Tasche'. CI_3_VOT contains recordings used for the analysis of voice onset time in /t/ in the word 'teilen'.
Group: Corpora with transcriptions and audio recordings
